title: Spectacular Old Town Condo with W/D & Balcony; Parking Included!
posting_body: ['Sunny unit is on the 8th floor of a mid-rise condominium building located in spectacular Old Town.', 'Rarely available, the upgraded 2 bed 1 bath unit includes many conveniences (fireplace, in-unit washer/dryer, indoor heated parking space).', 'The unit has a great layout and fantastic views from a large private balcony.', 'Extremely convenient for downtown commuters - Sedgwick Brown Line stop around the corner.', ' Close to the EL, the lake, across the street from XSport Gym, two blocks from Wells Street shops and restaurants, walk to EVERYTHING!', 'RENT INCLUDES:', 'Basic Cable, High Speed Internet, Gas Utility (a $200+ value)', 'AMENITIES:', 'Upgraded Kitchen with Dishwasher, Granite Counters, and Stainless Steel Appliances', 'In-Unit Washer/Dryer', 'Floor to Ceiling Windows', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Slate Bathroom with Two Sinks', 'Fireplace', 'Air Conditioning', 'Huge 17ft Outdoor Balcony with Expansive Western View', 'Elfa Closet Organizers', 'Solid Construction (never hear your neighbors)', 'Parking Space within Building included', 'LOCATION:', 'Walking distance to:', 'North Avenue Beach and Lake Path', 'Brown and Red Lines', 'Xsport Gym', 'Grocery Stores and Coffee Shops', 'Old Town (Wells Street) Restaurants and Bars', 'Clybourn and North Ave Shopping Corridor', 'Movie Theatre', 'Lincoln Park Zoo', 'ABOUT LANDLORD: Landlord is a small family living a few blocks away.', 'We are not a large corporate apartment company.', 'Best of luck in your apartment search!', 'If you are an apartment advertisement company, please do not contact me - I am not interested in listing my unit with you.']
